title: USA Rare Earth CEO: $3B in Possible Funds to Speed Plans
description: Barbara Humpton, USA Rare Earth CEO, discusses Trump’s minerals stockpile and the U.S. position in critical minerals markets with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Barbara Humpton, USA Rare Earth CEO, discusses Trump’s minerals stockpile and the U.S. position in critical minerals markets with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
